column5: Its a BEAUTIFUL sea cottage with a master bedroom that has a king size bed and the second bedroom has two full size beds. Comfortably sleeps 6 people. Comes free WIFI. If you love to fish or catch the sunset this place is perfect for you. It has its own fishing deck. Also with a flat screen tv mounted in the living room and master bedroom with cable. Also has a washer and dryer so no need to spend money on public washers and driers.
